section.heading: Statement of termination.
section.text: A dissolved limited partnership that has completed winding up may deliver to the Mayor for filing a statement of termination that states:

para.text: The name of the limited partnership;
The date of filing of its initial certificate of limited partnership; and
Any other information as determined by the general partners filing the statement or by a person appointed pursuant to § 29-708.03(c) or (d).

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 203 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act).
